label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_023
content:
## 2024-08-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 127
- Active: 119
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 30
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 8

#### By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 29
- Mid Dose: 32
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 34

### Immunogenicity By Group
#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 62.1
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 18.8
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 99.1
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 143.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 106.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 22.2

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 90.7
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.3
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 152.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 223.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 166.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 34.8

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 124.8
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 196.6
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 316.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 215.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 49.5

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 15.7
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 1.3
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 26.5
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 27.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 18.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 1.5

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 48.5
- Erythema Percentage: 28.2
- Swelling Percentage: 15.2
- Induration Percentage: 8.5
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 16.6

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 12.7
- Fatigue Percentage: 37.2
- Myalgia Percentage: 19.9
- Headache Percentage: 26.9
- Chills Percentage: 10.4

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.9
- WBC (K) SD: 1.3
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 35.8
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.1
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 53.8
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.6
- Platelets (K) Mean: 252
- Platelets (K) SD: 38
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.2
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2361, Description: chills, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2378, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2331, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Site 03 monitoring visit, 1 minor findings
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 20 subjects

### Notes
- Week 23: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 127 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
